title: Indonesia’s Imports of Indian Pickups to Cut GDP by $2.3 Billion
body: Indonesia's imports of 105,000 Indian pickup trucks can cause 330,000 people to lose their jobs.

title: Gold Rally Continues: Antam Advances to Rp 3.02 Mill, Spot Hits $5,169
body: Antam gold rises to Rp 3,028,000 per gram, up 21% YTD, as global prices hold above $5,100 on tariff uncertainty.

title: JCI Jumps on $6.1b BOP Surplus, Wall Street Boost
body: JCI climbs 0.76% at open as Q4 BOP swings to $6.1b surplus and Wall Street rally offsets global tariff uncertainty.

title: Indonesian Minister Flags Economic Risks of Planned Indian Pickup Imports
body: Agus Gumiwang signaled objection to a Rp 25 trillion plan to import Indian pickups, saying local factories can meet demand.

title: Indonesia Agrees to Buy 580,000 US Grandparent Chickens Under Trade Pact
body: Indonesia will import $20 million in US poultry breeding stock to boost genetics under its new reciprocal trade agreement.

title: Jakarta Renews ExxonMobil Deal in Cepu Until 2055 in $10 Billion Commitment
body: Indonesia extends ExxonMobil’s Cepu Block contract to 2055, securing a $10 billion investment commitment under a US trade pact.

title: Indonesia to Buy 1,000 Tons of US Rice Despite Prabowo’s Anti-Import Stance
body: Indonesia will import 1,000 tons of US rice under a trade pact, despite President Prabowo’s push to ban standard rice imports.

title: Indonesia Urged to Scrap Plan to Import 105,000 Pickup Trucks From India
body: The proposed imports — valued at an estimated Rp 25 trillion ($1.5 billion) — were first disclosed by the CEO of Agrinas Pangan Nusantara.

title: Indonesia Hopes Palm Oil Levy Stays Zero as Trump Slaps 10% Global Tariffs
body: Under the bilateral deal, US-bound Indonesian textiles and electronic components were also supposed to get 0% tariffs.

title: Indonesia Says Deal is Not in Force Yet After US Tariff Ruling
body: Indonesia also says that it will engage in further discussions after the US Supreme Court rules Trump's blanket tariffs as illegal.

title: Indonesia Eyes Ethanol Imports From US to Support Biofuel Mandate
body: Indonesia plans to import ethanol from the US to support its E10 fuel program, even as a court ruling clouds a broader trade deal.

title: US Supreme Court Tariff Ruling Opens Room for Indonesia to Reassess Trade Commitments
body: A US court ruling against Trump’s tariffs eases pressure on Indonesia and opens the door to rethinking trade commitments with Washington.

title: Murky Outlook for US Businesses After Tariff Ruling Prompts Countermoves by Trump
body: Businesses face renewed uncertainty after the Supreme Court struck down Trump-era tariffs, as the former president vows new trade moves.

title: Indonesia to Cut ASEAN Import to Make Room for $15 Billion US Energy
body: Indonesia says it is also open to importing less energy from other sources such as the Middle East and Africa.

title: OJK Orders Listed Firms to Lift Public Shares to 15% or Face Delisting
body: Indonesia’s market regulator will require listed firms to lift public ownership to 15% within two years or risk delisting.

title: Indonesia Swallows US Poison Pill in New Trade Deal as Trump Isolates China
body: The US has threatened to terminate the tariff deal if Indonesia makes a deal with a country that "jeopardizes" Washington's interests.

title: OJK Fines Stock Influencer Rp 5.35 Billion for Share Price Manipulation
body: OJK fined a social media stock influencer Rp 5.35 billion for manipulating share prices through misleading online posts.

title: Lawmakers, Industry Question Indonesia’s Rp 25 Trillion Car Import Plan
body: Indonesia’s plan to import Rp 25 trillion in vehicles from India is drawing criticism from industry and lawmakers over jobs and capacity.

title: Rupiah Edges Up 6 Points as US-Indonesia Tariff Deal Lifts Sentiment
body: Rupiah closes at Rp 16,888, up 6 points, after Indonesia-US tariff signing, despite hawkish Fed tone and strong US data.
